name: Feather Brain
description:
Always forgetting your keys ?

Can't remember where the remote is ?
Need to improve your memory ?
Feather Brain can help you !
(... maybe)

* Use your memory to find pairs of cards in a randomly shuffled deck.
* The fewer moves you need to match all the cards, the better your score.
* Hundreds of levels, with increasing difficulty.

* Friendly birds will tweak the rules to help you.
* Not-so-friendly bird will tweak the rules to stop you.
* Push your memory to its limit during boss fights.
* Call your flock to the rescue when in trouble !

This is the PC version of Feather Brain. It's ads-free and all corresponding game mechanics have been changed accordingly.
